author: Special Correspondent
text:
In two separate incidents on Sunday, a 14-year old died after he fell into well and a 19-year old went missing while trying to swim in the Marina.

According to police, Navaz (14), a class X student and a resident of Lakshmi Nagar in Poonamallee, was walking on a field with his friends on Sunday, when he accidentally fell into a well. The fire and rescue services rescued him and rushed him to the Kilpauk Medical College. However, he was declared dead on arrival.

In the second incident, four youngsters from Gummidipoondi went to the Marina and hired a boat ride. Two of the boys jumped into the sea for a swim but were engulfed by a huge wave. Of them, Manikandan (19), went missing.

A case has been registered with the Anna Square police station and a search is on for the missing boy.
title: Boy drowns in well; another missing at sea
